scenes.background: Emma frowns slightly while looking at Ryan.
scenes.description: 'I think an outdoor activity would be a great way to bond and relax.'

options.text: Why not combine both? We could start with a dinner and then head outdoors.
options.analysis: You tried to find a middle ground, showing good perception, empathy, and social skills, but self-regulation and motivation were moderate.

options.text: I guess some people might find it exhausting, but it could be worth a try.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the potential downside but expressed tentative support, showing good self-regulation and motivation, but empathy and social skill were moderate.

options.text: An outdoor activity doesn't sound appealing to everyone. Maybe we should reconsider.
options.analysis: You expressed your disagreement calmly, showing good empathy and motivation, but social skill and perception were lower.
